newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: United Engineers sees 1997 profit flat.
newsitem.headline: United Engineers sees 1997 profit flat.

text.p: United Engineers Ltd said on Tuesday it expects its 1997 net profit to remain the same as that of 1996.
The group said in a statement accompanying its full year results that income from rental properties would depend in large part to the condition of Singapore's economy.
Fueled by increasing overseas business, its engineering and construction as well as its health care services division were expected to grow, it said.

The statement also said the group's manufacturing and equipment supply and its information technology divisions were expected to reduce operating losses and improve their performance after restructuring business activities.
The company said its 1996 net profit rose 54 percent to Singapore $15.05 million from S$9.79 million.
